Alternate Title: Army of Paris, People of Paris
Description: Proclamation signed by General GALLIENI stating that the Government of the Republic has left Paris to give a fresh impulse to national defense. He has been entrusted with the task of defending Paris against the invader and will do so.
Physical Collection: Texas War Records War Poster collection
